ygData.subject: Re: Undocumented Everfrost Location
ygData.msgSnippet: The portal itself doesn t seem functional as of yet.. but its in the center of a room, its a round structure with one entrance.  You can step inside, but as
ygData.messageBody:
The portal itself doesn't seem functional as of yet.. but its in the center
of a room, its a round structure with one entrance. You can step inside,
but as soon as you step into the center you are transported back to its
entrance. I don't know what the portal to the plane of hate looks like, I
can only describe this one.

Lance

-----Original Message-----
From: Taoism [mailto:tca@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 30, 1999 10:36 AM
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Undocumented Everfrost Location


From: "Taoism" <tca@...>

I have yet to see this area, but since you describe it as a shrine it may be
one of the portals to the planes. Possibly. Though is sounds a tad weakly
guarded to be a portal ( the portal for the plane of hate is guarded by 6
Spectres and a level 41ish Necro ).


Just a thought.


Cheers,
Taoism Wyndfist.
